hero.description: A native Mac app that effortlessly cleans annoying metadata files from external drives, making your storage experience seamless across all devices.

features.title: One-Click Cleanup
features.description: Remove hidden .DS_Store, ._ (AppleDouble), .Spotlight-V100, etc. files with a single click.

features.title: Safe & Secure
features.description: Preview exactly what will be removed before cleaning. No surprises.

features.title: Clean & Eject
features.description: Cleanup metadata and safely eject drives when you're done using them.

features.title: Lightweight & Simple
features.description: No menu bar clutter or background processes. Run it when you need it.
